document.discussion_title: Talent On The Spot | Executive And Marketing Contract Staffing
document.topic_text: Looking for a new contract opportunity? Find out some of the perks of contracting through Naviga. Learn More Talent On the Spot Contract Staffing Contractors. Right. Now. What is Talent On the Spot? Naviga’s Talent On the Spot services connects companies with top marketing and executive talent on a contract and temp-to-perm basis. What are the benefits of using Talent On the Spot? Hiring marketing professionals and executives on a contract basis reduces the risk of turnover and eliminates high training and salary costs. Not only can you choose how long you want the contract to last, but we will find you qualified candidates right when you need them. Learn more. What services are included in Talent On the Spot? Our Talent On the Spot employer services include: Marketing On the Spot >> | Executives On the Spot >> Call us today for more information at 866.487.4156
